Text.Page:
[Celestial Hills Report]

1. The Scions ignored the baetyliths entirely. Their research is limited to the Cardovek Remnants.

2. The Scions took exception to our interference and mounted an attack on the Sanctum Mysterium. Thanks to some assistance from our federation friend, the attack was repulsed.

3. Due to an increase in hostile forces, I'm requesting two squads of venators from Allemantheia. Violence, it seems, is the only answer to the threats we face.

â€”Mattin, Sanctum MysteriumPut away the report.
